languages.text: "И он все еще на свободе и волен действовать как ему угодно. На вашем месте, Абеляр, я бы озаботился тем, чтобы более ни один подданный фон Валанциус не пребывал в неведении касательно его предательства".
"And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."
languages.original_text: "И он все еще на свободе и волен действовать как ему угодно. На вашем месте, Абеляр, я бы озаботился тем, чтобы более ни один подданный фон Валанциус не пребывал в неведении касательно его предательства".

traits.locale_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如今他依然逍遥法外，胡作非为。如果我是你的话，阿贝拉德，我一定会确保冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的所有臣民都清楚地了解他的背叛行为。”
languages.original_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."

traits.locale_text: “如今他依然逍遥法外，胡作非为。如果我是你的话，阿贝拉德，我一定会确保冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的所有臣民都清楚地了解他的背叛行为。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Dire qu'il est encore quelque part, là, dehors, et libre d'agir comme il l'entend... À votre place, Abélard, je m'assurerais qu'aucun sujet des von Valancius n'ignore l'ampleur de sa traîtrise. »
languages.original_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."

traits.locale_text: « Dire qu'il est encore quelque part, là, dehors, et libre d'agir comme il l'entend... À votre place, Abélard, je m'assurerais qu'aucun sujet des von Valancius n'ignore l'ampleur de sa traîtrise. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Y sigue en libertad, pudiendo actuar como le plazca. Abelard, en su lugar me aseguraría de que los demás súbditos de la casa von Valancius quedan informados de su traición».
languages.original_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."

traits.locale_text: «Y sigue en libertad, pudiendo actuar como le plazca. Abelard, en su lugar me aseguraría de que los demás súbditos de la casa von Valancius quedan informados de su traición».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「それに、奴は野放しで好き勝手ができる自由の身だ。アベラルド、俺がお前の立場なら、フォン・ヴァランシウスの家臣がこれ以上、奴の背信行為を無視しないように計らう」
languages.original_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、奴は野放しで好き勝手ができる自由の身だ。アベラルド、俺がお前の立場なら、フォン・ヴァランシウスの家臣がこれ以上、奴の背信行為を無視しないように計らう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Und er läuft noch immer frei herum und tut, was er will. Ich an Eurer Stelle, Abelard, würde dafür sagen, dass alle Untertanen der Dynastie von Valancius von seinem Verrat erfahren."
languages.original_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."

traits.locale_text: "Und er läuft noch immer frei herum und tut, was er will. Ich an Eurer Stelle, Abelard, würde dafür sagen, dass alle Untertanen der Dynastie von Valancius von seinem Verrat erfahren."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."

languages.text: "Hâlâ serbest, dilediğince gezip dolaşıyor. Abelard, yerinde olsaydım her bir Valancius tebaasının bu ihanetten haberdar olmasını sağlardım."
languages.original_text: "And he is still at large and free to act as he pleases. If I were you, Abelard, I would see to it that no more von Valancius subjects are kept ignorant of his treachery."

traits.locale_text: "Hâlâ serbest, dilediğince gezip dolaşıyor. Abelard, yerinde olsaydım her bir Valancius tebaasının bu ihanetten haberdar olmasını sağlardım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
